# UserLocationAnnotation

**Class**

An annotation that represents someone’s location.

## Declaration

```swift
class UserLocationAnnotation extends Annotation
```

## Discussion

The framework automatically adds a person’s location annotation to the map view when the map view’s [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/showsUserLocation] property is set to `true`.

## Instance Properties

- **coordinate**: The coordinate of the annotation, that represents a person’s location on the map.
- **draggable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can drag the the user location annotation.
- **size**: The size of the user location annotation.

## Annotations

- **Clustering annotations**: Combine multiple annotations into a single clustered annotation.
- **Annotation**: The base annotation object for creating custom annotations.
- **ImageAnnotation**: A customized annotation with image resources that you provide.
- **MarkerAnnotation**: An annotation that displays a balloon-shaped marker at the designated location.
- **PlaceAnnotation**: An annotation for a place.
- **MapFeatureAnnotation**: An object that represents a map feature that the user selects.
